Israeli attacks in Gaza add to heavy Palestinian toll in war on HamasIsraeli forces pounded central Gaza by land, sea and air and Palestinian authorities reported dozens more deaths, with the U.N. health agency saying thousands of people were trying to flee the fighting. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 22:55:37 GMT YK5KURHO7BL2FDH2GLINQPT7P4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-attacks-gaza-add-heavy-palestinian-toll-war-hamas-2023-12-27/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud, James Mackenzie世界中东
Moldova's president says Putin must be stoppedRussian President Vladimir Putin must be stopped in his war against Ukraine or all of Europe will pay a much higher price, Moldova's pro-European president, Maia Sandu, said in an interview published on Wednesday. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 22:32:40 GMT DFK7CCXYYJOSVHP475UYRTMXFI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldovas-president-says-putin-must-be-stopped-2023-12-27/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
US court rejects sentence appeal by Mexican drug lord 'El Chapo'A U.S. court has rejected an appeal by former Mexican drug lord Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman to review a 2019 ruling that sentenced him to life in prison. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 21:50:04 GMT RXT3DV2NDJJUZMV64GDLSECIT4 https://www.reuters.com/legal/us-court-rejects-sentence-appeal-by-mexican-drug-lord-el-chapo-2023-12-27/Reuters合法的诉讼
Six Palestinians killed in Israeli raid in West Bank city of TulkarmSix Palestinians were killed by a drone strike during an Israeli raid n the West Bank city of Tulkarm, the Palestinian health ministry said on Wednesday, one of the latest examples of rising violence since the start of the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 21:36:13 GMT 7BRKAKQNRZKSVCGJHS2WBNU4UQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/six-palestinians-killed-israeli-raid-west-bank-city-tulkarm-2023-12-27/Ali Sawafta世界中东
North Korea's Kim orders military to accelerate war preparations -state mediaNorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un has ordered its military, the munitions industry and the nuclear weapons sector to accelerate war preparations to counter what he called unprecedented confrontational moves by the U.S., state media said on Thursday. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 21:29:58 GMT TVR2R3QG4VNWPI7L55755ELERQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-koreas-kim-orders-military-accelerate-war-preparations-kcna-2023-12-27/Reuters世界亚太地区
US to provide up to $250 mln in arms, equipment to Ukraine -BlinkenThe U.S. will provide up to $250 million in arms and equipment to Ukraine in the final package of aid this year to help Kyiv in its war with Russia, Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Wednesday. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 20:57:35 GMT CLX275J35ZKQRLUWSEYKR4ACZY https://www.reuters.com/world/us-provide-up-250-mln-arms-equipment-ukraine-blinken-2023-12-27/Reuters世界
Sudan RSF leader visits Uganda in first known wartime foreign tripThe leader of Sudan’s paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF) General Mohamed Hamdan Dagalo said on Wednesday he met Uganda's President Yoweri Museveni, his first confirmed appearance outside of Sudan since the war between RSF and the Sudanese army broke out in April. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 20:48:29 GMT 5Q55DBIO7RJNNFAHQCVN3尊米https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/sudan-rsf-leader-visits-uganda-first-known-wartime-foreign-trip-2023-12-27/Reuters世界非洲
Biden says US air strikes in Iraq aimed to deter Iran, militants from attacksThe U.S. military's air strikes on Monday in Iraq aimed to deter Iran and Iran-backed militia groups from conducting or supporting attacks on United States personnel and facilities, President Joe Biden said on Wednesday. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 19:51:06 GMT NFXB6VJC3NMTDNY6IXA6MSEYTU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/biden-says-us-air-strikes-iraq-aimed-deter-iran-militants-attacks-2023-12-27/Kanishka Singh世界美国
At least 40 more people die in floods and landslides in DR CongoAt least 40 more people have died in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, local authorities said, after heavy downpours overnight on Tuesday unleashed floods and landslides that left residents digging through the mud to find bodies. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 19:01:51 GMT VNLG6LYPDBMXJECC56IO5A7UGE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/least-40-more-people-die-floods-landslides-dr-congo-2023-12-27/Reuters世界非洲
Turkish court refuses to release jailed MP despite top court rulingA Turkish court refused on Wednesday to release the newly elected opposition lawmaker Can Atalay despite a Constitutional Court ruling that his rights to security, liberty and to be elected were violated. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 18:59:53 GMT福克斯博希WJKGTHJYM5KPGR3444 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkish-court-refuses-release-jailed-mp-despite-top-court-ruling-2023-12-27/Reuters世界中东
Mexico leader urges US to invest in people, not walls, ahead of Blinken meetingMexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador said on Wednesday the U.S. Congress should focus on investing in people instead of building walls, hours before he was set to meet Secretary of State Antony Blinken to discuss migration to the United States. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 18:17:54 GMT 2UR3Z6W7N5N33EMVOHWBF6TZZU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-leader-urges-us-invest-people-not-walls-ahead-blinken-meeting-2023-12-27/Reuters世界美洲
